author: Cybernews
description:
On January 12, 2010, Google revealed that it was hacked. In a few days, a multitude of other major companies came forward admitting the same. Eventually, these attacks became known as Operation Aurora: one of the most ambitious hacking campaigns ever conducted. What clues about its origin and purpose can be found by digging deep enough into the code?

🎯 Subscribe to @cybernews for more hacking documentaries, tech innovation and the latest in cybersecurity: https://cnews.link/subscribe/

title: The Hack That Started a New Cold War: Operation Aurora
